[Information] 

 

Chiffon Fabric Bolt

Combining delicate sheer elegance with soft flowing effect, this chiffon bolt is an emblem of style and sophistication. Impart an air of fluid flair to your chair décor, table décor, DIY crafts, and other creative masterpieces with these cascading fabric bolts. Transform plain and lackluster spaces and items into lush accent pieces with these sheer beauties.

Multi-Purpose

Featuring sheer, shimmery fabric in lovely hues, our beautiful Chiffon Fabric Bolts are perfect for multiple decoration purposes. Ideal for your tailoring and sewing projects, make custom head pieces, hair accessories, or add sheer beauty to your dresses and fashion accessories. Craft lavish chair belts, chair sashes, or chair ties to give an ethereal look to your party chairs, place atop your tables as table runners, wrap around pillars, posts, or columns for a luxe look, or swathe your flowers, bouquets, balloons, favor & gift boxes, vases, and centerpieces to add a stylish aesthetic charm.

Easy to Wash and Wrinkle-Free

These premium quality Chiffon Fabric Bolts are a great décor accessory to give a quick elegant look to otherwise plain and drab items. Easy to wash and wrinkle-free, use these time and time again to exude luxurious lavishness to your home décor or party ambiance.

 

Additional Information:

[Information]

Splaying from all the sides, our gorgeously flared pom poms are absolutely fab! Dangling magically from your ceilings, tree branches, or fixtures, these fluffy pom poms seem to float enchantingly in midair. These paper pom poms are an amazing embellishment to every occasion. From rehearsal dinners to weddings, showers to Halloween and Christmas Parties, or even birthday bashes, these vibrant hanging puffs provide a cheery and whimsical way to add more color and verve to any party venue. Hang them up a ceiling or a tree, bundle them high into corners, place around a candle holder, make into a centerpiece atop a centerpiece holder, or snip away for a paper project-whatever your urges, fancies, and out-of-the-box plans are, use these fanciful pom poms to impart a fluffier, softer, and dreamlike look to them!

Used In: Craft decoration, Boho themed party, baby shower, nursery, birthday party, Christmas party, wedding
Note: As they are natural feathers, they may vary in sizes and shape.
All sizes are approximate measurements

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • These Satin trim feathers can be used as Cake stand decors, dream catcher, mask, feather garland, and decorating for wall art, boho themed party, baby shower, nursery, birthday party, christmas party.
  • Use for many DIY projects as decorative craft feathers.
  • They’re real feather set, so feathers may vary in size and shape.

Steps to Clean the Feathers:

  • Fill the bucket or tub with warm water.
  • Add a small amount of Woolite and agitate the water to mix.
  • Swish the feathers around the water. Do NOT scrub the feather as this will damage them.
  • Rinse by swishing in clean water.
  • Reshape the feathers.
  • Dry with a blow dryer on a low setting.

Product Width: 9"
Shape: Round
Recyclable: Yes

View All 9'' Size Round Plates

[Information]

Create an elegant and sophisticated presentation at your upcoming special event or a festive meal with these classy disposable plastic plates. Our astounding collection of picturesque plastic plates combines the convenience of plastic with the charismatic appeal of real china. With these beguiling plates, make your cleanup time a cinch for any occasion.

Whether its a jubilant birthday party or a festive wedding reception; these plates are an ideal choice for salads, cereals, main course, desserts, appetizers, and more. Lovely metallic trimmed borders enhance the elegance of this disposable ware. The stupendous range of colors gives you liberty to arrange your dishware in accordance to your events decor and theme.

Our trim band accented plates will adorn your dining table with elegant sophistication. These disposable plastic plates are strong and sturdy, thus will avoid the spilling of food while eating. During exciting indoor events and summer fun activities, make dining and tidying a breeze with our special disposable plastic plates.

 

Additional Information:

  • WARNING: Not Microwave or Dishwasher Safe
  • Perfect for wedding receptions, banquets, and upscale catered events

This fluffy flower symbolizes honor, fortune, love, and beauty in all forms. Our silk replicas mimic the delicate beauty and peerless charisma of original Peony bushes, imparting an exotic appeal and colorful radiance to dull tables, backdrops, vases and centerpieces. Use these bundles of joy on their own to adorn your home or party ambiance, or pair with other silk flowers, stems, branches, and leaves to make mesmeric masterpieces. Unlike their fresh counterparts, these undying silk blossoms will always stay colorful, vibrant, and blooming, exuding everlasting festive colors of bliss all around!
